product_name: The North Face Buttery Bunting - Infants'
long_description: The North Face Buttery bunting swaddles your infant in sumptuously soft fleece to help keep your little one warm and happy while tagging along on your wintery outdoor adventures. Warm, breathable fleece dries quickly, insulates even when wet and is easy to care for; taffeta lining slides smoothly over layers of clothing. Buttery bunting has zippers on both sides for easy entry and exit. Fold-over mittens keep hands warm; attached hood warms your little one's head and ears.
short_description: The North Face Buttery bunting swaddles your infant in sumptuously soft fleece to help keep your little one warm and happy while tagging along on your wintery outdoor adventures.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
